1.words_touch: Hm...|Discounts? No!|I'm sure you'll get something good in your next tech pack...|Bothering me isn't going to give you cheaper prices...
1.words_buy: Thanks for your business!|How 'bout buying a bit more this time?|You've got good eyes...
1.words_enter: Ah? Welcome, welcome...|Ah, you're back again...|Looking for a Tech Pack...?
